proposed_strategy.name: Validated Single Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: The entire document (Caturtha Prapathaka) is small enough to be processed as a single chunk, minimizing API calls while respecting the 125,000 character limit.

execution_plan.description: Complete Fourth Prapathaka, Khandas 1 through 17, including the commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Prapathaka is logically and hierarchically divided into Khandas, which serve as the main semantic units for parsing.

start_pattern.description: A new Khanda begins with a bolded heading indicating its number.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Khanda is marked by a concluding line for its commentary (Bhāṣyam).

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial text containing the Prapathaka title should be treated as high-level contextual information before parsing the first Khanda.
